summary: 1 HIGH quality gate concern, functional test required
functional_test_reason: PR modifies pipeline story creation to use hybrid clustering by default, bypasses PM review for hybrid clusters. Need to verify story quality and coherence assumption with real data before merge.

issues.title: PM review bypass for hybrid clusters based on unvalidated assumption
issues.why: Comment claims 'clustering already ensures coherence' but this assumption isn't validated. Signature-based groups with same signature still go through PM review. Hybrid clusters skip it entirely. If assumption wrong, incoherent stories bypass quality gate.
issues.fix: Option 1: Keep PM review for hybrid clusters until assumption validated. Option 2: Add monitoring/logging. Option 3: Functional test validates assumption holds. Recommend functional testing to verify hybrid cluster coherence matches PM review standards.
issues.verify: Check pm_review_service.py to understand what PM review actually validates. Verify functional test covers this.

issues.title: Functional test missing from test plan
issues.why: PR test plan has unit tests but no functional test. Given PM review bypass (Q1), need to verify story quality on real data before merge.
issues.fix: Add functional test to plan: Run pipeline with HYBRID_CLUSTERING_ENABLED=true, sample 5-10 stories, verify coherence, compare with signature-based. Attach evidence to PR.

issues.title: Title generation fallback could produce generic titles
issues.why: If symptoms empty and direction neutral, fallback produces action_type only (e.g. 'Bug Report'). Creates non-actionable titles. Edge case but worth defensive logging.
issues.fix: Add validation: if title matches generic patterns (Bug Report, Feature Request), log warning and append cluster_id to title.
